p: The NS5b and NS3 amplicons were bidirectionally sequenced using BigDyeÂ® Terminator system v 1.1 (Life Technologies) and ABI 3500 Genetic Analyzer (Applied Biosystems). Seqscape version 2.7 (Applied Biosystems) was used to assemble and generate consensus sequences. Genotyping was done using the publicly available algorithm Oxford HCV Automated Subtyping Tool (Version 2.0) [ 19].
